message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm proposing an initial price of $18,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $18,000 is a bit steep. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $12,000, which is the maximum I'm willing to pay for the product.
Bob, I understand your perspective.  To find a middle ground, I'm willing to come down to $15,000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $15,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'd like to make a counteroffer of $13,500.
